metadata.feature_description: View and manage all unpublished posts including drafts and posts under review

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Publisher module loads and edit bar is visible
steps.actual: Publisher module loaded successfully with edit bar visible at bottom

steps.action: Check for Unpublished Posts button in edit bar
steps.expected: Unpublished Posts button visible when there are unpublished posts
steps.actual: Unpublished Posts button visible (link icon) next to Settings button when draft posts exist

steps.action: Click Unpublished Posts button to view panel
steps.expected: Panel shows table with Name, Date Created, Author, and Actions columns
steps.actual: Unpublished panel displayed correctly with table showing: Test Save Draft Workflow Post | 2/9/2026 3:17 PM | SuperUser Account | View/Edit actions

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View Post action from unpublished list

steps.action: Click View Post action icon for unpublished post
steps.expected: Navigate to post detail view showing unpublished content
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to post view showing title, date, content, and author info

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edit Post action from unpublished list

steps.action: Click Edit Post action icon for unpublished post
steps.expected: Navigate to post edit page with content editable
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to edit page with title field populated, content editable, Edit Post Details panel visible with Title, Description, URL fields, and Change Author panel

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Empty state when no unpublished posts

steps.action: Verify Unpublished Posts button visibility when no unpublished posts exist
steps.expected: Unpublished Posts button should be hidden when there are no unpublished posts
steps.actual: Unpublished Posts button correctly hidden from edit bar; only Settings button and Create Post link visible

observations: Code review shows filter, sort, bulk select, delete, workflow state details, and export features do not exist in the UI. The UnpublishedPosts.ascx only provides a simple table view with View and Edit actions.
The Unpublished Posts panel is accessed from the Publisher module's edit bar which appears at the bottom of the page when on a page with the Publisher module.
The Unpublished Posts button only appears in the edit bar when AnyUnpublishPosts property is true (i.e., there are unpublished posts in the system).
Posts in 'Save Draft' workflow remain unpublished until explicitly published. The View and Edit links correctly navigate to the post detail and edit pages respectively.
